department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Margarita Uk is a lecturer at the College of Computing and Digital Media at DePaul University and a practicing Database Administrator and programmer. She has a B.S. in Computer Science and a M.S. in Information Systems, both from DePaul University. Her research interests are in Business Intelligence, Database Administration, and Database Programming. She has been employed as a Database Administrator at John Marshall Law School and has been involved in a number of projects focusing on Business Intelligence, Reporting, Data Warehousing, data visualization, and connecting legacy data to web-based systems. Previously she has worked on front-end web design, implementation and integration of the CRM system and other IT projects.
